Shield (W1 Evoc): Self gains frontal AC 2 vs. thrown, AC 3 vs. arrows and bolts, AC 4 vs. melee attacks, and +1 saves for 35 rd
Shocking Grasp (W1 Alte): Touched suffers 1d8+7 HP
Shout (W4 Evoc): R30' Cone inflicts 2d6 HP and deafness for 2d6 rd (Save no damage and half duration)
Simulacrum (W7 Illu): Self controls a half-strength copy of another creature
Sink (W8 Ench): R70' Target becomes embedded in floor (Save neg)
Sleep (W1 Ench): R100' Creatures up to 4+4 HD in a 15' radius sleep for 35 rd
Slow (W3 Alte): R160' 7 targets in a 40' sq move at half speed for 10 rd
Solid Fog (W4 Alte): R30' Fog in 70' cu slows and reduces vision to 2' for 2d4 + 7 rd
Spectral Force (W3 Illu): R130' Creates a 110' sq sight, sound, smell, and temperature illusion for conc + 3 rd
Spectral Hand (W2 Necr): R65 Glowing hand delivers +2 touch attacks for 14 rd
Spell Turning (W7 Abju): Non-area, non-touch spells aimed at self reflect onto caster for 21 rd
Spider Climb (W1 Alte): Touched may move 30'/rd on walls and ceilings for 8 rd
Spook (W1 Illu): R10' Target flees from self (Save neg)
Statue (W7 Alte): Touched may become stone at will for 7 hr
Stinking Cloud (W2 Evoc): R30' Creatures in a 20' cu retch for 1d4 + 1 rd (Save neg) for 7 rd
Stone Shape (W5 Alte): Reshapes 7' cu of stone
Stone To Flesh (W6 Alte): R70' Restores stoned creature (system shock required) or converts 63' cu stone to flesh (Reverse flesh becomes stone (Save neg))
Stoneskin (W4 Alte): Touched gains immunity to next 1d4 + 3 blows
Strength (W2 Alte): Touched gains +1d4 (HD d4), +1d6 (HD d8), or +1d8 (HD d10) Strength for 7 hr
Succor (W9 Alte): Breaking item transports target to self home
Suggestion (W3 Ench): R30' Target follows reasonable suggestions for 8 hr (Save neg)
Summon Shadow (W5 Conj): R10' 7 obedient shadows appear for 8 rd
Summon Swarm (W2 Conj): R60' Calls vermin that inflict 1 HP/rd to 10' cu for conc + 2 rd
Symbol (W8 Conj): Glowing symbol causes death, discord 5d4 rd, fear (Save -4 neg), hopelessness 3d4 tn, insanity, pain 2d10 tn, sleep 4d4 + 1 tn, or stunning 3d4 rd
Tasha's Uncontrollable Hideous Laughter (W2 Ench): R60' 2 targets in 30' cu suffer -2 attack and damage for 7 rd
Taunt (W1 Ench): R60' Targets in 30' radius attack caster
Telekinesis (W5 Alte): R70' Moves 175 lb object for 9 rd
Teleport (W5 Alte): Transports self and 250 lb carried weight to a familiar location
Teleport Without Error (W7 Alte): Instantly transports self + 250 lb to known location
Temporal Stasis (W9 Alte): R10' Places target into permanent suspended animation (Reverse awakens)
Tenser's Floating Disc (W1 Evoc): R20' 3' diameter x 1" thick force disk follows self and holds 700 lbs for 10 tn
Tenser's Transformation (W6 Alte): Self becomes a warrior (dbl HP, AC +4, 2/rd dagger +2 damage) for 7 rd
Time Stop (W9 Alte): Self may perform extra actions in a 15' radius for 1d8 + 3 segs
Tongues (W3 Alte): R30' Self may converse in any language (Reverse muddles) for 7 rd
Transmute Rock To Mud (W5 Alte): R160' 140' cu rock becomes mud (Reverse mud becomes rock)
Transmute Water To Dust (W6 Alte): R60' undefined water becomes powder
Trap The Soul (W8 Conj): R10' Traps target soul in a gem (Save neg)
True Seeing (W6 Grea): Touched discerns deceptions and alignment auras in a 120' radius for 7 rd (Reverse obscures)
Unseen Servant (W1 Conj): Creates an invisible force that performs simple tasks in a 30' radius for 13 tn
Vacancy (W4 Illu): R70' 70' radius appears abandoned for 7 hr
Vampiric Touch (W3 Necr): Touched suffers 3d6 HP, self gains same as temporary HP for 1 hr
Vanish (W7 Alte): Teleports or sends to the aethereal plane a touched 350 lb object
Veil (W6 Illu): R70' Creates an illusionary 140' sq terrain for 7 tn
Ventriloquism (W1 Illu): R60' Self may throw voice for 11 rd ((Intelligence - 12) * 10% disbelieve)
Vision (W7 Grea): Self seeks the answer to a question; may suffer geas
Wall Of Fire (W4 Evoc): R80' Creates a 140' sq wall or 35' radius circle that inflicts 4d4+7 HP to passers, 2d4 HP to creatures w/in 10', and 1d4 to creatures w/in 20', for conc + 7 rd
Wall Of Fog (W1 Alte): R30' Creates fog in a 140' cu that obscures sight for 2d4 + 7 rd
Wall Of Force (W5 Evoc): R30' Creates an invisible, impenetrable 140' sq wall for 17 tn
Wall Of Ice (W4 Evoc): R70' Creates a 700' sq ice wall for 7 tn
Wall Of Iron (W5 Evoc): R35' Creates a 1.75" thick, 105' sq metal wall
Wall Of Stone (W5 Evoc): R35' Extends from existing stone a 1.75" thick, 140' sq wall
Water Breathing (W3 Alte): Touched may breathe water (Reverse may breathe air) for 21 tn
Web (W2 Evoc): R35' Creates a 80' cu sticky web that spans anchor points for 14 tn

Wish (W9 Conj): Performs a major alteration of reality
Wizard Eye (W4 Alte): Self may see through and move 30'/rd an invisible eye w/600' vision and 100' infravision for 7 rd
Wizard Lock (W2 Alte): Holds shut touched door, gate, or window
Wizard Mark (W1 Alte): Permanent personal rune inscribed on touched
Wraithform (W3 Alte): Self becomes insubstantial and immune to non-magical weapons for 14 rd
Magic Notes: Spell Book: Understands 5-7 spells of each level; has a 40% chance to understand a particular spell
